/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

On the left side of the street, there's a brick building with a blue roof, adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. On the right side, a red brick building stands tall, its vibrant hue contrasting with the blue sky. 

In the background, a mountain covered in lush green trees rises majestically, providing a natural backdrop to the urban setting. Power lines crisscross above the street, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. 

The image is a beautiful blend of urban and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing. It's a snapshot of everyday life in this bustling city, captured in a moment of tranquility.
